detaileddescription.para: Direct3D11 rendertarget or depth-stencil view. NO_BIND
Direct3D11 read-only depth-stencil view. Present only on depth-stencil surfaces. NO_BIND
Set viewport update mode. Default is to update when visible. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Queue manual update of the viewport(s).
Mark the GPU resource destroyed on graphics context destruction. Only used on OpenGL.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned width, unsigned height, unsigned format, int multiSample)
memberdef.name: CreateRenderBuffer

briefdescription.para: Create renderbuffer that cannot be sampled as a texture. Only used on OpenGL.
Return whether manual update queued. Called internally.
Reset update queued flag. Called internally.
Return Direct3D11 rendertarget or depth-stencil view. Not valid on OpenGL.
Return Direct3D11 read-only depth-stencil view. May be null if not applicable. Not valid on OpenGL.

detaileddescription.para: Return whether multisampled rendertarget needs resolve. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set or clear the need resolve flag. Called internally by Graphics.
Color or depth-stencil surface that can be rendered into.
